title: Five-Star Spa Escape on the English Coast with AA Rosette-Awarded Dining
description: Discover the beauty of Cornwall, an English seaside county home to some of the countryâ€™s most stunning rugged coastline, at the grand historic Headland Hotel & Spa. A beloved domestic escape, Cornwall evokes childhood memories of family vacations spent on the beach and enjoying famous Cornish pasties and ice cream. Come and experience it for yourself, staying in an upgraded Splendid Room with daily breakfast, an AA Rosette-awarded three-course dinner for two, a traditional Cornish cream tea for two, a bottle of sparkling wine and local treats in your room on arrival.
offer_address: Fistral Beach, Headland Rd, Newquay TR7 1EW, United Kingdom

title: Idyllic UK Family-Friendly Escape along Cornish Coast with Complimentary Kids Club Sessions
description: Experience the elegant charms of a quintessential Victorian mansion at Fowey Hall , a family-friendly retreat on the picturesque Cornish coast. Overlooking the stunning Fowey estuary, the historic manor house is a joyful abode, with facilities to capture the imaginations of both big and little travellers. Parents can savour the taste of Cornwall with locally sourced dishes at the hotel's onsite restaurant, go for a refreshing swim in the pool or pamper with a massage at the luxury spa, all while the little ones are entertained at the Four Bears Den kids' club. If you wish to explore, the iconic Eden Project and the Lost Gardens of Heligan are moments away.
offer_address: Hanson Dr, Fowey, Cornwall, PL23 1ET, United Kingdom
